element.headline: case study - Luxury all over Australia

BEBaseFoundation.hdlPageTitle: case study - Luxury all over Australia

BELayoutT8.hdl_headline: Layout - T8 2396 - case study - Luxury all over Australia

lst_Event.stf_subheader: Sydney, Hayman Island, Tasmania and Melbourne

BEGenericHeaderAndConentBody.txt_HTML:
Forty two very high achievers from a luxury car company were treated to the very best of Australia in an incentive program that took in four Australian destinations.

The program began in the sparkling city of Sydney, before moving to the World Heritage-listed Great Barrier Reef, where guests stayed on magnificent Hayman Island. The program then showed a whole new side of Australia, as guests headed to Tasmania for a range of eco experiences, before ending in Melbourne, Australia’s style and events capital.

All flights within Australia were on chartered aircraft, ensuring departure and arrival times completed suited the client’s plans. Various fixed and non-fixed wing aircraft were also used to arrive at different destinations for activities.

Some of the highlights included a program tailored to Tasmania’s culinary delights and themed around the Bushtucker Man so guests could experience the Tasmania outback in gourmet luxury, and a gala event in a heritage listed shopping arcade, which included the local chocolate shop opening especially so guest could have their dessert.

The experience was extremely well received by the attendees and the client.

“I must stop to thank you and all of your very capable staff at ID for partnering with us to provide such a wonderful experience for our Incentive program,” said the key client. “We had nothing but compliments and positive feedback from our clients, as well as the dealers… You must be very proud of the work ethic and enthusiasm they all show to everyone.”
